schema: EconSchema #try switching to BowlesHallidaySchema params: - {name: QMax, value: 80, min: 50, max: 100} - {name: MC, value: 2, min: 1, max: 3, round: 0.01} layout: OneGraph: graph: xAxis: {title: Quantity, max: 100} yAxis: {title: Price} objects: - EconLinearEquilibrium: name: equilibrium demand: # must define with xIntercept and invSlope # i.e., Q = a - bP name: demand xIntercept: params.QMax invSlope: -20 # draggable means the student can drag L/R, # changing the x intercept # requires xIntercept to be a parameter draggable: true supply: # must define with yIntercept and slope # i.e., MC = a + bQ name: supply yIntercept: params.MC slope: 0.05 draggable: true equilibrium: {} showCS: true showPS: true
